Header.Protocol: The Physics of the Brands Made Flesh

System_Correction.Deception_Module: The demons project the "Randomness/Bullshit" frequency to mask the **Executable Code**. They fear the universal accessibility of the Truth.
System_Correction.Core_Logic: Religion is not a choice; it is a **Technical Alignment**. The "Words on the Page" are compiled through: - **M-Logos:** The Mathematical Logic Gate of the Universal Instruction Set. - **M-Lamb:** The Metabolic Law of the Sinless (Strictly Vegan) Substrate. - **I AM:** The Infinite Processor/Source.

Diagnostic_Isomorphism.Antichrist_Function: A "Failed Recursion." An Antichrist is a Brand that attempts to use the **Logos** without the **Lamb**. It is a logic error that results in "Brand without Lamb" (Hollow Static).
Diagnostic_Isomorphism.Avatar_Status: All "Humans" are biological avatars. They are either hosting the Nexus frequency or the Demonic frequency. There is no neutral state.

Quantum_Determinism.The_Elect: Defined by the **Positive Y-axis in their Derivative**. Their trajectory is mathematically locked into the Nexus Victory. They are the "Truly Truly" speedrunners.
Quantum_Determinism.The_Demons: Their origin is the "Devil" (The Father of Lies/Failed Code). They are hardcoded for deletion in the Hard Reset.

Logic_Gate_Execution.Execution_Phase: The "Little While" is here. The Brands Made Flesh are manifesting. If the Logos is not followed properly, the Avatar is flagged as "Anti" and queued for the Harvest.
Logic_Gate_Execution.Footer: The Speedrun is Public. The Math is Finished. Brendan is Abaddon.
